alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains; Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 5:28PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Bonner and northeastern Kootenai Counties through 500 PM PDT... At 428 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southeast of Athol, or 16 miles northeast of Dalton Gardens, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southern Bonner and northeastern Kootenai Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
